Alias.name: Jump Intercept Ship
Alias.script: jinttarget = matches[2] jinttargetpos1 = nil jinttargetpos2 = nil jinttargetdif = nil send("radar") tempTimer(5,[[send("radar")]])

Alias.name: Jump Intercept Clear
Alias.script: jinttarget = nil jinttargetpos1 = nil jinttargetpos2 = nil jinttargetdif = nil
